name: Quantitative Methods in Economics
description: This course deals more rigorously with the topics included in ECO220Y5. It is a requirement for certain Specialist Programs and is strongly recommended to adequately prepare students for ECO375H5/ECO327Y5. This course is also recommended for students contemplating graduate school. [48L, 24T]
exclusions: BIO360H5, BIO361H5; ECO220Y5; (PSY201H5,PSY202H5); (STA218H5/STA220H5, STA221H5, STA255H1/STA256H5)/ (STA257H5/STA256H5, STA258H5)/(STA257H5/STA256H5, STA261H5/STA260H5), SOC350H5, SOC351H5
